DOC.brief_summary: The satiety effects of pulses compared to a matched smoothie will be measured.
DOC.brief_title: Satiety Effects of Pulses Compared to Matched Protein Smoothie
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators will compare satiety and food intake after consumption of purses or a calorie/protein matched smoothie
DOC.criteria: healthy, normal body weight, smoker, restrained eating habits, recent weight change, history of disease, vegetarian, do not normally eat breakfast or lunch, are pregnant or lactating, have irregular menstrual cycles
